td.content: s:pt presents with 3 weeks history of Hemorrhagic Stroke. pt is a 35 YO white female. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 92.8 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Hemorrhagic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed protamine sulfate - 1 mg /90 units of heparin overdosage, and ordered CT Head, ECG.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
